subtitle: A beautiful starter for entertaining or an elegant, light lunch when served with fresh, warm rolls.

method.text: Cut each melon in half. Scoop out the seeds. Cut the melons into quarters. Using a round melon baller, scoop out the flesh to create balls of melon.
In a large bowl, mix the melon balls with the peeled prawns and tomato halves. Chill well for 20 min.
In a screw-top jar, mix the oil, lemon juice, vinegar, mustard, seasoning and mint. Shake well to combine. Chill.
Just before serving, pour the dressing over the melon, prawn and tomato mixture. Toss well then divide between individual serving dishes.
Garnish with whole prawns, dill sprigs and lime slices. Serve immediately.

title: Prawn and melon ball delight
